General.Name: Relpol SA
General.Description: Relpol S.A. manufactures and sells relays worldwide. The company offers electromagnetic subminiature, miniature PCB power, industrial plug in, signal, power, modular installation, bistable-impulse, interface, programmable, time, monitoring, and solid state relays, as well as blog, power controllers, plug-in sockets and accessories, signal lamps, contractor, power supply products, charging station, and relay for railroad industry. Its products are used in the areas of industrial and power automation, power electronics, industrial and applied electronics, telecommunication, household appliances, etc. Relpol S.A. was founded in 1958 and is based in Zary, Poland.
